data.description: Module for communicating with a Magellan GPS
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module first came into existence as a set of hacks against
    Brian J. Hennings' gpsutil[1] program, which was working with my
    Magellan receiver. But I wanted a Perl interface and GPS::Garmin
    (although Magellan support is mentioned in the docs) it couldn't
    talk to my Magellan.
